column5: My watchlist only has about 17 green tickers out of 300 and one is the TVIX Funny thing is 4 of the green ones are SLNO XOMA KPTI IOVA all tickers Ive been pushing since beginning of the week Thats what strong charts do They resist the disaster that is this disgusting market better than other ones do Thats because they have all their trend lines underneath them rather than being underneath all their trend lines I dont think Im anything special I just want you all to know you can do this too Accept 25 as winners and take more wherever possible Buy strong charts and make purchases with set goals not buying shit on a whim or out of reaction or emotion Put a price on a Trend line and say that where Ill buy no questions asked and sell on the trend line above it if its having trouble breaking it Sorry my posts are so long I just want to take care of my people and teach you this stuff
